exposurecompensation: -5 -+5 EV in increments of 1/3, 1/2, or 1 EV
flashmodes: rear-curtain sync, slow sync, red-eye reduction with slow sync, red-eye reduction, Front curtain sync, slow rear-curtain sync; Auto FP High-Speed Sync supported
afmodes: Single-point AF, 9-, 21-, or 51- point dynamic-area AF, 3D-tracking, auto-area AF
selftimer: 2 s, 5 s, 10 s, 20 s; 1-9 exposures at intervals of 0.5, 1, 2, or 3 s
displaytype: 3.2 inch TFT LCD Screen with 921k dots
ioports: SuperSpeed USB3.0, mini HDMI, Audio input/output
lensmount: Nikon F mount (with AF coupling and AF contacts)
shutterspeed: 1/8000 – 30 s in steps of 1/3, 1/2, or 1 EV, bulb, X250
imagesensor: 35.9 x 24.0 mm CMOS sensor (Nikon FX format)
